localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Influencers, Superpage gives a new way to fund your passion by responding to fan messages. By setting up your unique contact page, you can now let anyone send a message by paying what they want.
blogPost.body: Influencers, Superpage gives a new way to fund your passion by responding to fan messages. By setting up your unique contact page, you can now let anyone send a message by paying what they want.
blogPost.title: Superpage - A contact page for influencers
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 有影响力的人，Superpage提供了一种新的方式，通过回复粉丝信息来资助你的热情。通过设置您独特的联系页面，您现在可以让任何人通过支付他们想要的费用来发送消息。
localize.tagline: 有影响力的人的联系页面

localize.description: 有影響力的人，Superpage提供了一種新的方式，通過回覆粉絲信息來資助你的熱情。通過設置您獨特的聯繫頁面，您現在可以讓任何人通過支付他們想要的費用來發送消息。
localize.tagline: 有影響力的人的聯繫頁面

previous.title: There’s going to be hyperinflation when all the Bitcoin gets converted into dollars.

localize.full_text: 当所有比特币都兑换成美元时，将会出现恶性通货膨胀。
當所有比特幣都兌換成美元時，將會出現惡性通貨膨脹。

next.excerpt: When you read an email you will see a numerical score just below the subject–a score between 0 and 100. A score of 100 means the email is very easy to read and a score of 0 means the email is very difficult to read.
next.title: Gmail inbox Readability Score - Calculating the readability score of an email

localize.description: 当你阅读一封电子邮件时，你会在主题下方看到一个数字分数-一个介于0到100之间的分数。分数100表示电子邮件非常容易阅读，分数0表示电子邮件很难阅读。
localize.tagline: 计算电子邮件的可读性分数

localize.description: 當你閱讀一封電子郵件時，你會在主題下方看到一個數字分數-一個介於0到100之間的分數。分數100表示電子郵件非常容易閱讀，分數0表示電子郵件很難閱讀。
localize.tagline: 計算電子郵件的可讀性分數
